H0.text: Who, according to legend, cut the Gordian Knot. Alexander the Great

H1.text: Who, according to legend, cut the Gordian Knot. Hercules

H2.text: Who, according to legend, cut the Gordian Knot. Perseus

H3.text: Who, according to legend, cut the Gordian Knot. Sikunder

A4.text: Alexander 'undid' the hitherto unsolvable Gordian Knot

A5.text: Alexander the Great later went on to conquer Asia as far as the Indus and the Oxus

A6.text: An oracle had declared that any man who could unravel its elaborate knots was destined to rule over all of Asia
